[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Add 2 new refuable lamps that uses fungo of mushrooms: glowstool and agarilux. Also, the vanilla Glowstool and Agarilux now are growable.
[h1]Mushroom Lamps[/h1] Glowstool and Agarilux lamps are the same except for the colors (blue and pink). The range of light it's a little less than the vanilla range. 5 fungus maintain a lamp working for 7,5 days.
[h1]Growable Mushrooms[/h1] "Devilstrand" project research are changed to "mushrooms" [i]Mushrooms Research[/i] unlocks devilstrand, glowstool and agarilux. The grow time of glowstool/agarilux are changed to half.
[h1]Compatible[/h1] Easily compatible with existent saves and mods.
